headline.print_headline: Music School Announces Musical Theater Degree
headline.main: Manhattan School of Music to Offer Musical Theater Degree

snippet: The program will be directed by Luis Perez, an actor and choreographer who has led the musical theater program at Roosevelt University since 2008.
abstract: The program will be directed by Luis Perez, an actor and choreographer who has led the musical theater program at Roosevelt University since 2008.
